main event: A civilian woman reported a sighting of disc-shaped objects flying in formation over Houlton, Maine on August 2, 1952 for a duration of 35 minutes, with several objects leaving the formation and returning.
interesting points: The observation involved disc-shaped objects flying in formation and leaving the formation at different times.
The witness was a civilian woman, providing credibility to the report.
The object was reported to have a very light green color with individual lights spread out in the north and concentrated to the west.
The estimated height of the object was 2,500 feet above the earth, and it was approximately 1,500 feet away from the witness.
The witness was a 27-year-old male sales representative from the University of Maine, providing specific details about the observer.
